sentences.en: Agents provocateurs may seek to discredit the opposition.
sentences.cn: 密探可能会力求败坏反对派的名声。

sentences.en: Always seek professional legal advice before entering into any agreement.
sentences.cn: 在签订任何协定之前一定要先征求法律专业人士的意见。

sentences.en: Attractive woman, 27, seeks male, 25-35, for fun and friendship.
sentences.cn: 魅力女性，27岁，欲觅25-35岁男子为友，同玩共乐，发展友情。

sentences.en: Do you think the President will seek re-election ?
sentences.cn: 你认为总统会谋求连任吗？

sentences.en: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.cn: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.en: Each member of OPEC would seek to maximize its own production.
sentences.cn: 石油输出国组织的每个成员国都寻求最大限度地提高本国石油产量。

sentences.en: He also denied that he would seek to annex the country.
sentences.cn: 他还否认会试图吞并该国。

sentences.en: Henry was inclined to seek solace in drink.
sentences.cn: 亨利往往借酒消愁。

sentences.en: His instinct would be to seek a new accommodation with the nationalists.
sentences.cn: 他本能的反应会是寻求与民族主义者取得新的和解。

sentences.en: If you are badly burnt, seek medical attention.
sentences.cn: 如果是严重烧伤，就得去看医生。

sentences.en: In order to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output.
sentences.cn: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

sentences.en: It is wise to seek help and counsel as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 尽快寻求帮助和建议乃明智之举。

sentences.en: Many employers seek diversity in their staffs.
sentences.cn: 很多雇主寻求雇员的多样性。

sentences.en: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.cn: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.en: Prosecutors may soon seek an indictment on racketeering and fraud charges.
sentences.cn: 检举官可能不久就会以敲诈勒索与欺诈罪名提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Students may decide to seek tutorial guidance.
sentences.cn: 学生可以决定寻求导师指导。

sentences.en: the end she knew, the means were to seek.
sentences.cn: 她目标明确，但实现这一目标的手段还没有找到。

sentences.en: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.cn: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

sentences.en: We finally insisted that he seek psychiatric help.
sentences.cn: 我们最后坚持要求他寻求精神科医师的帮助。

sentences.en: When that doesn't work they sometimes have the sense to seek help.
sentences.cn: 那种方法不奏效的时候，他们有时会想到要寻求帮助。

sentences.en: Yet now he was here, in extremis, to seek an alliance.
sentences.cn: 然而现在他就在这里，在绝境中寻求联盟。

phrases.tran_cn: (英)去找（叫猎狗去找回打死猎物的指令）
要求赔偿；寻求解决办法

trans.tran_cn: 寻找，谋求，请求（帮助），征求（意见），想方设法
trans.tran_en: to look for someone or something
to try to achieve or get something
